channel.title: Bitcoin Design on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Bitcoin Design on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Bitcoin Core Gui
item.description: Name: Bitcoin Core GUI introductory meeting Topic: Agenda link posted below Location: Bitcoin Design (online) Video: No video posted online Agenda: https://github.com/BitcoinDesign/Meta/issues/8 The conversation has been anonymized by default to protect the identities of the participants. Those who have expressed a preference for their comments to be attributed are attributed. If you were a participant and would like your comments to be attributed please get in touch. Bitcoin Core PR review There seems to be a lot to learn about the background of Bitcoin Core, how work gets done, what it should be, what it is right now, why it is the way it is right now.
